headline.print_headline: Paul Stanley: Kiss Miffed at Rock Hall Over Snub
headline.main: Paul Stanley: Kiss Miffed at Rock Hall Over Snub

docs.snippet: Paul Stanley of Kiss wants to shout it out loud: The band is miffed at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame for not inducting members Eric Singer and Tommy Thayer along with the original lineup....
docs.lead_paragraph: Paul Stanley of Kiss wants to shout it out loud: The band is miffed at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame for not inducting members Eric Singer and Tommy Thayer along with the original lineup.

headline.print_headline: California Woman, No Longer a Fugitive, Set Free
headline.main: California Woman, No Longer a Fugitive, Set Free

docs.snippet: Fugitive charges were dropped against a 60-year-old woman who escaped from a Michigan prison in 1977 after authorities discovered she had surrendered decades ago and already been sentenced to time served....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fugitive charges were dropped against a 60-year-old woman who escaped from a Michigan prison in 1977 after authorities discovered she had surrendered decades ago and already been sentenced to time served.

headline.print_headline: Canizares Fires 69 for 6-Shot Lead in Morocco
headline.main: Canizares Fires 69 for 6-Shot Lead in Morocco

docs.snippet: Alejandro Canizares of Spain extended his lead to six strokes in the third round of the Trophee Hassan II after shooting a 3-under 69 on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alejandro Canizares of Spain extended his lead to six strokes in the third round of the Trophee Hassan II after shooting a 3-under 69 on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Patriots Announce Signing of CB Brandon Browner
headline.main: Patriots Announce Signing of CB Brandon Browner

docs.snippet: The addition of cornerbacks Darrelle Revis and Brandon Browner gives the New England Patriots' mediocre secondary an improved look....
docs.lead_paragraph: The addition of cornerbacks Darrelle Revis and Brandon Browner gives the New England Patriots' mediocre secondary an improved look.

headline.print_headline: Knicks Extend Season-Best Win Streak to 6
headline.main: Knicks Extend Season-Best Win Streak to 6

docs.snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 23 points, Tim Hardaway Jr. had 20, and the New York Knicks beat the Milwaukee Bucks 115-94 on Saturday, giving them a season-high six straight victories as they prepare to welcome Phil Jackson back to the franchise....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 23 points, Tim Hardaway Jr. had 20, and the New York Knicks beat the Milwaukee Bucks 115-94 on Saturday, giving them a season-high six straight victories as they prepare to welcome Phil Jackson back to the franchise.

docs.snippet: Funeral services for 22-year old man, who was killed in a violent anti-Russia protest in Donetsk. Deborah Lutterbeck reports....

headline.print_headline: Silicon Valley Billionaire Buys Record Life Policy
headline.main: Silicon Valley Billionaire Buys Record Life Policy

docs.snippet: An unnamed Silicon Valley billionaire has purchased the world's most valuable life insurance policy....

headline.sub: Families of missing passenger find hope in latest developments
headline.main: Families of missing passenger find hope in latest developments

docs.snippet: Latest developments indicate that Flight MH370 had its communications and tracking systems deliberately turned off, according to officials. Nathan Frandino reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Latest developments indicate that Flight MH370 had its communications and tracking systems deliberately turned off, according to officials. Nathan Frandino reports.

headline.print_headline: Obama National Security Aides Meet to Discuss Ukraine
headline.main: Obama National Security Aides Meet to Discuss Ukraine

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama's national security team discussed the Ukraine crisis in a session at the White House on Saturday after a last-ditch bid to find a diplomatic solution to the Cold War-style standoff with Russia floundered....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama's national security team discussed the Ukraine crisis in a session at the White House on Saturday after a last-ditch bid to find a diplomatic solution to the Cold War-style standoff with Russia floundered.

headline.print_headline: Supporters of Algeria's Bouteflika Rally for His Re-election
headline.main: Supporters of Algeria's Bouteflika Rally for His Re-election

docs.snippet: Several thousand supporters of Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika rallied on Saturday to support his re-election bid in a show of strength by those who portray him as key to stability in the North African country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Several thousand supporters of Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika rallied on Saturday to support his re-election bid in a show of strength by those who portray him as key to stability in the North African country.
